name: Are You Alone?
description: Ask and answer the question- Are You Alone? This is a life and dating sim about trying to balance unbalanceable things with limited resources. Don't expect a typical dating sim, this definitely isn't it. A fully text-based adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Any Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: Any
